content.rendered:
Pebbles of Wisdom is a compilation of quotes and insights by Sadhguru from several talks, sathsangs and discourses over many occasions and many years.

This selection of gems by Sadhguru is something every reader will want to return to time and time again.

excerpt.rendered: Pebbles of Wisdom is a compilation of quotes and insights by Sadhguru from several talks, sathsangs and discourses over many occasions and many years. This selection of gems by Sadhguru is something every reader will want to return to time and time again.
